# init(_:)

**Initializer**

Creates a custom state key.

## Declaration

```swift
init(_ rawValue: String)
```

## Creating a custom state key

- **init(rawValue:)**: Creates a custom state key with the specified raw value.

items.description: Creates a custom state key with the specified raw value.
